flipr 1.0.4

Reference

All functions

collisionEnergyLabel()

Creates the x-axis plot label depending on precursorActivationType and precursorCollisionEnergyUnit as new columns precursorCollisionEnergyUnitLabel.

createLipidCreatorParameters()

Add parameter for instrumentId (cvTerm) and output format suitable for LipidCreator import.

dlnormMode()

#huber loss function #' @export huberLossPw <- function(x, hgamma = 0.05) stopifnot(is.double(x)) if (abs(x) <= hgamma) 0.5 * (x) ^ 2 else hgamma * abs(x) - ((hgamma ^ 2) / 2)

dlnormPar()

Parameterized version of the log-normal density function dlnorm with additional "norm" expression and "scale" factor. Both are multiplied with the actual log-normal density kernel.

fits()

Calculates the nonlinear fits for the given tibble. Data will be grouped by combinationId, species, fragment, adduct, polarity, calculatedMass, foundMassRange[ppm], and group columns. Calculates non linear regression models by performing an interative grid search within the coordinate bounds provided by lower and upper vectors, starting at start_lower and start_upper. Intermediate models are scored by the AIC value until convergence has been achieved as to the defaults of nls.multstart.

flip()

Calculates non linear regression models by performing an interative grid search within the coordinate bounds provided by lower and upper vectors, starting at start_lower and start_upper. Intermediate models are scored by the AIC value until convergence has been achieved as to the defaults of nls.multstart.

plotFits()

Plots information about the fits (residuals, predictions, confidence intervals).

plotFragmentPpmBoxplot()

Plots a PPM deviation boxplot for all fragments.

plotMassDensityDistribution()

Plots the mass density distribution.

plotMzVsMerrPpm()

Plots m/z vs. the mass error in ppm.

plotNumberOfSamplesPerCombinationId()

Plots the number of data samples for each combinationId.

plotParameterConfidenceIntervals()

Plots the confidence intervals for the parameters used for model optimization.

plotPrecCollEnergyVsFoundIntensity()

Plots precursor collision energy vs found raw intensity.

plotPrecCollEnergyVsMassErrorPpm()

Plots the precursor collision energy vs. the fragment mass error in ppm.

plotPrecCollEnergyVsScanRelativeIntensityNormalized()

Plots precursor collision energy vs. total scan intensity normalized relative fragment intensity in separate panels.

plotPrecCollEnergyVsScanRelativeIntensityOverlay()

Plots precursor collision energy vs. total scan intensity normalized relative fragment intensity overlaid on one panel.

plotPredictedFits()

Plots the predicted fits.

plotRawTicVsTotalIonCurrent()

Plots the raw, non-normalized TIC values.

plotResiduals()

Plots the residuals between predicted and measured values.

plotResidualsMeanSumSq()

Plots the mean of the squared sum of residuals.

plotResidualsQQ()

Plots the residuals quantile-quantile plot between calculated residuals and an assumed normal distribution.

plotScanRelativeIntensityHistogram()

Plots the scan relative intensity histogram.

writeGroup()

Selects combinationId, precursorCollisionEnergy and scanRelativeIntenty to write to file.
